title: Mobile Responsive Design QA
testingOrder: Test on a real mobile device or Chrome DevTools mobile emulation (390px width). Start with Section 1 (Navigation), then work through each page. Test both light and dark mode. Then verify Section 13 (Desktop Unchanged) on a full-width browser.

groups.name: Bottom Tab Bar
items: Bottom tab bar visible at bottom of screen on mobile (<768px) with four tabs: Home, Transactions, Budget, More
Bottom tab bar hidden on desktop (≥768px)
Active tab icon/label highlighted with accent color
Tapping Home tab navigates to Dashboard
Tapping Transactions tab navigates to Transactions page
Tapping Budget tab navigates to Budget page
Tapping More tab opens bottom sheet menu (not a page navigation)

groups.name: More Menu
items: More bottom sheet contains: Reports, Net Worth, Import, Settings
Tapping Reports navigates to Reports page and closes sheet
Tapping Net Worth navigates to Net Worth page and closes sheet
Tapping Import navigates to Import page and closes sheet
Tapping Settings navigates to Settings page and closes sheet

groups.name: Desktop Sidebar
items: Sidebar visible on desktop (≥768px) with all navigation links
Sidebar completely hidden on mobile (<768px)
Mobile header displays current page title

groups.name: Page Navigation
items: Navigate to every page via tab bar and More menu — all pages load without errors
Browser back/forward buttons work correctly between mobile pages
Deep-linking to a page URL on mobile shows correct tab as active

groups.name: Responsive Modal Behavior
items: All modals render as bottom sheets on mobile (below 768px)
All modals render as centered modals on desktop (at or above 768px)
Resizing browser across 768px boundary switches between modal and sheet

groups.name: Bottom Sheet Chrome
items: Bottom sheet has drag handle (36px × 4px bar) at top center
Bottom sheet has rounded top corners
Semi-transparent backdrop visible behind sheet
Tapping backdrop closes the sheet
Pressing Escape key closes the sheet
Sheet content scrolls vertically when taller than 92vh
Body scroll is locked when sheet is open (background doesn't scroll)

groups.name: Transaction Sheets
items: Add Transaction → opens as bottom sheet with full form
Edit Transaction → opens as bottom sheet with pre-filled form
Saving a transaction from sheet closes it and updates the list

groups.name: Settings Sheets
items: Add Account → opens as bottom sheet with account form
Edit Account → opens as bottom sheet with pre-filled account data
Add Category → opens as bottom sheet with category form
Edit Category → opens as bottom sheet with pre-filled category data
Add User → opens as bottom sheet with user creation form
Edit User → opens as bottom sheet with user details
Delete User two-step flow: preview step renders inside sheet, typing username confirmation works inside sheet

groups.name: Net Worth Sheets
items: Update Balances → opens as bottom sheet with balance inputs
Add Asset → opens as bottom sheet with asset form

groups.name: Bank Sync Sheet
items: SimpleFIN Connection setup → opens as bottom sheet in Settings > Bank Sync

groups.name: + Transaction Pill
items: "+ Transaction" pill visible on Transactions page on mobile
"+ Transaction" pill NOT visible on Dashboard page
"+ Transaction" pill hidden on desktop
Tapping "+ Transaction" pill opens Add Transaction bottom sheet
Pill positioned above the bottom tab bar with no overlap

groups.name: + Category Pill
items: "+ Category" pill visible on Settings > Categories sub-page on mobile
"+ Category" pill hidden on desktop
Tapping "+ Category" pill opens Add Category bottom sheet
Pill positioned above the bottom tab bar with no overlap

groups.name: Pill Styling
items: Both pills use primary button styling: dark background, white text, pill/rounded shape
Pills are horizontally centered on screen
Pills are hidden when a bottom sheet is open

groups.name: Layout
items: KPI cards render in a 2×2 grid (not 4 columns)
All content fits within mobile viewport width — no horizontal scrollbar
Page is vertically scrollable with all sections accessible

groups.name: Recent Transactions
items: Recent transactions render as stacked cards (not table rows)
Each card shows description and amount on the top line
Each card shows date and category/account badges on the bottom line
Amounts use correct sign coloring (green for income, black for expense, red for reversals)

groups.name: Transaction Cards
items: Transactions render as stacked cards (not table rows)
Each card shows description and amount on top line
Each card shows date and category/account badges on bottom line
Tapping a transaction card opens Edit Transaction in a bottom sheet

groups.name: Filters & Search
items: Date filter pills visible and horizontally scrollable
Search input visible and functional
Filtering updates the card list correctly
No horizontal overflow on the page itself

groups.name: Navigation & Controls
items: Month navigation arrows work (previous/next month)
Owner filter chips visible and tappable
Switching owner filters updates budget data

groups.name: Income Section
items: Income section renders as a single card with category rows
Each row shows category name on the left, budget and actual amounts on the right

groups.name: Expense Section
items: Expense section shows one card per category group
Each group card has a colored dot in the header matching category color
Each sub-category row shows "actual / budget" with a progress bar
Over-budget amounts displayed in red
"actual /" text visible in both light and dark mode

groups.name: Budget Editing
items: Tapping a budget value opens inline edit field
Budget input auto-focuses when tapped
Budget input shows decimal keyboard on mobile (inputMode="decimal")
Saving budget value updates the display and progress bar

groups.name: View Toggle
items: Toggle visible to switch between Monthly Detail and Annual Totals
Toggling between views works without errors

groups.name: Monthly Detail View
items: Month pill selector visible and horizontally scrollable
Selecting a month updates the displayed data
Category cards are expandable — tap to expand/collapse
Expanded card shows category breakdown for selected month

groups.name: Annual Totals View
items: Category list with year totals displayed
All categories visible with correct totals

groups.name: Desktop Unchanged
items: Desktop still shows the full 12-column monthly table (no regressions)

groups.name: Top Section
items: Hero card displays total net worth prominently
Update Balances button visible and tappable
Tapping Update Balances opens bottom sheet with balance inputs

groups.name: Accounts
items: Accounts grouped by classification (checking, savings, credit card, etc.) as cards
Each account card shows name, balance, and owner badges
Investment accounts show expandable holdings section within their card
Expanding holdings shows individual holding names and values

groups.name: Depreciable Assets
items: Depreciable assets render as individual cards (not table rows)
Each card shows: name, purchase date, original cost, method badge (SL or DB X%), and current value
Add Asset button visible on mobile
Tapping Add Asset opens bottom sheet with asset form

groups.name: Desktop Unchanged
items: Desktop still shows side-by-side Accounts and Depreciable Assets layout

groups.name: Import Options
items: Action cards for CSV Import and Bank Sync visible and tappable
Cards fit within mobile width without overflow

groups.name: CSV Import
items: CSV file upload works on mobile (tap to select file)
Column mapping and preview screens usable on mobile width

groups.name: Bank Sync
items: Bank Sync account selection works in bottom sheet on mobile
Transaction review list renders as cards on mobile

groups.name: Drill-Through Navigation
items: Main settings page shows list of sections (Accounts, Categories, Users, Preferences, etc.)
Tapping a section navigates to sub-page
"← Back" link visible on each sub-page and navigates back to main list
Settings/Preferences tab toggle renders full width

groups.name: Accounts Sub-Page
items: Account cards displayed (not table rows)
Tapping an account card opens Edit Account bottom sheet

groups.name: Categories Sub-Page
items: Category cards grouped by type (Expense groups, Income)
"+ Category" floating pill visible at bottom

groups.name: Users & Permissions
items: Users & Permissions section visible for admin/owner roles only
User cards display role badges and permissions

groups.name: Preferences
items: Dark mode toggle works on mobile
Password change form works on mobile with correct keyboard types

groups.name: Keyboard Types
items: Amount fields show decimal keyboard (inputMode="decimal") — test in Add Transaction
Budget amount fields show decimal keyboard — test on Budget page
Username fields do not auto-capitalize — test on Login page
Search fields do not auto-capitalize — test on Transactions page

groups.name: AutoComplete
items: Login username field has autoComplete="username" (password manager fills it)
Login password field has autoComplete="current-password"
Setup/registration password field has autoComplete="new-password"

groups.name: Focus Behavior
items: No input auto-focuses when a bottom sheet opens (user must tap to focus)
Budget inline edit auto-focuses when tapped (this is NOT inside a bottom sheet)
All touch targets are at least 44px in height (buttons, inputs, cards, tab bar items)

groups.name: Global Dark Mode
items: Toggle dark mode on mobile via Settings > Preferences
All pages render with correct dark background (#0b0f1a main, #141926 cards)
No white flashes or unstyled elements during page transitions

groups.name: Navigation & Chrome
items: Bottom tab bar styled correctly in dark mode (dark background, visible icons/labels)
Bottom sheets styled correctly in dark mode (dark card background, visible text)
FAB pills (+ Transaction, + Category) visible and legible in dark mode

groups.name: Page Content
items: Dashboard KPI cards and transaction cards readable in dark mode
Transaction cards have visible borders and text in dark mode
Budget progress bars visible against dark card backgrounds
Budget "actual /" text visible in dark mode (not dark-on-dark)
Reports category cards legible in dark mode
Net Worth account cards and asset cards readable in dark mode
Settings list items and sub-pages readable in dark mode
No invisible or barely visible text on any page in dark mode

groups.name: Layout
items: Sidebar navigation visible and functional on desktop
All pages render with desktop layout (tables, side-by-side sections, 4-column KPIs)
No mobile-only elements visible on desktop (no tab bar, no FAB pills, no drag handles)

groups.name: Modals
items: All modals render as centered overlays on desktop (not bottom sheets)
Modal backdrop and close behavior unchanged on desktop

groups.name: Tables
items: Transactions page shows full table with all columns on desktop
Reports page shows full 12-month table on desktop
Net Worth page shows side-by-side layout with tables on desktop
Budget page shows desktop layout (not card-based) on desktop

groups.name: No Regressions
items: Navigate through every page on desktop — no visual breakage or layout shifts
All desktop interactive elements (hover states, tooltips, dropdowns) still work
Window resize from desktop to mobile and back — layouts switch cleanly without artifacts
